DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study determine safety LY2409021 healthy participant participant diabetes . The study drug give single oral dos . Each participant receive 3 dos , minimum 7 day washout dose period . Side effect document . This study approximately 9 week long , include screen . Screening require within 6 week prior start study .
DOC.brief_title: A First-in-Human Study LY2409021 Healthy Participants Participants With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: For participant : Must either male , female become pregnant , either healthy type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) take medication diabetes Have hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) value less equal 10 % screen Have blood urine laboratory test result acceptable study For healthy participant : Have screen body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 29.9 kg/m^2 inclusive Have fast blood glucose 3.05.2 millimoles/liter ( mmol/L ) screening Have plasma glucose , two hour ingest oral 75 g glucose load , less 7.8 mmol/L For participant type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) : Have screen body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 35 kg/m^2 inclusive Must weigh 45 kg screen Have fast blood glucose le 11.1 mmol/L screen Have plasma glucose , two hour ingest oral 75 g glucose load , great equal 11.1 mmol/L For participant : Have participate study new drug last 30 day Have history significant heart , lung , liver , kidney , stomach brain disease , medical problem may cause increase risk study Have hypertension require singleagent therapy , blood pressure great 140/90 millimeter mercury ( mmHg ) monotherapy Are allergic LY2409021 similar drug Have regular alcohol intake great 21 units/week ( male ) , 14 units/week ( female ) , unwilling stop alcohol require study restriction ( 1 unit = 360 mL beer , 150 mL wine , 45 mL spirit ) Intend use overthecounter prescribe medicine 7 14 day respectively study , study . Medicines high cholesterol high blood pressure allow diabetes . Have significant blood disorder and/or donate blood ( 450 ml ) last 3 month For participant T2DM : Have sign serious problem diabetes ( For example , severe eye problem , poorly heal skin ) Have history coma due low blood sugar
